mapper.insert: insert into exhibitions(exhibition_id, gallery_id, exhibition_name, exhibition_description, exhibition_start_date, exhibition_end_date, exhibition_url) values(seq_exhibition.NEXTVAL, #{gallery_id}, #{exhibition_name}, #{exhibition_description}, #{exhibition_start_date}, #{exhibition_end_date}, #{exhibition_url})
mapper.update: UPDATE exhibitions SET exhibition_valid = 0 WHERE exhibition_name = #{exhibition_name}

update exhibitions set exhibition_name = #{exhibition_name}, gallery_id = #{gallery_id}, exhibition_description = #{exhibition_description}, exhibition_start_date = #{exhibition_start_date}, exhibition_end_date = #{exhibition_end_date}, exhibition_url = #{exhibition_url} where exhibition_id = #{exhibition_id}
